authors.name: Roscoff Culture Collection
authors.affiliation: Station Biologique, CNRS-Sorbonne Université, Roscoff France

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"abpf4","text":"Please refer to our general recommendations to grow cultures :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2frsv","text":"\nhttps://www.protocols.io/private/A48906DC1374AD6281495CB86A8F092F","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Ecology of Marine Plankton (ECOMAP) team - Roscoff

materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"172f5","text":"Equipments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar6eb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abrue","text":"Autoclave","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgmjp","text":"
Laminar flow cabinet (or biosafety cabinet) 

Vacuum pump","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q2sd","text":"
Magnetic hot plate stirrers


Materials 

Glass fibre prefilters (Millipore, AP1507500)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"736gh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ru8m","text":"Filtration unit Stericup GP Merck Millipore, pore size 0.22 µm (Millipore, S2GPU02RE)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80qdm","text":"
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1agd9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8sce8","text":"Add 1200ml of MilliQ water to the soil. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cjug","text":"Close the erlenmeyer with a aluminium foil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1av4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"atgmq","text":"Heat at 100°C with pemanent mixing during 1 hour to obtain an efficient boiling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lnnk","text":"Adjust this time depending on the volume (more volume, more time).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdbm5","text":"Let cool.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cuv4b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhp9q","text":"Filtrate on 0.2 µm, using a glass prefilter and a pump vacuum. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2pk0","text":"As the prefilter will be rapidly clogged, better to add the boiled soil 100mL per 100mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpktu","text":"If this happens, replace the glass prefilter, then the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ckj82","text":"Transfer the solution in one or several glass bottles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28dg2","text":"The day after, when the medium is at room temperature, place it at 37°C for 24 to 48 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4udkf","text":"Then autoclave again at 121°C for 20 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jnn0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsu9f","text":"This step allows to reactivate spores (fungi etc) contained in soil which have not been destroyed by the first sterilization, and to kill them during the second one. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"faf77","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"av83j","text":"Add 50ml of soil extract per 1 L of medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m3vv","text":"Soil is sampled in a pine wood near Roscoff, Brittany, France. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbnjt","text":"Each sampling is placed in plastic boxes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47roj","text":"Back to the laboratory, plastic boxes are placed at 37°C for 12 to 24 hours to dry it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ed7b1","text":"Weigh 30g of dried soil and place it in a 4L glass erlenmeyer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dshq4","text":"Autoclave at 121°C for 20 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sloi","text":"Place the bottle of the filtered-boiled soil under a safety cabinet, and let it cool.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Soil extract for cocultures host-parasites media
